please help me with KDE  i can only log in as the root if i log with the normal user it says could not start kstartconfig please check your installation
i-m in jubuntu but no one can help me
i got an ubuntuinstall upgraded to kde
you have done something wrong if all you can do is log in as root - that is not default behaviour for Ubuntu and it seems to be a little strange to me (but that is just me)
well they are the kde experts we are in the land of gnome ;-) ergo I asked, what puzzles me is that you can log in as root, that should not be possible
couple you wait about 15 minutes between asks, it seems that no one knows the answer at this time
how come you got a root password that I find curious
that is not really a good idea, log out, then log into a console (Ctrl+Alt+F1 to get there) and do this, cd ~yourusername ; chown -R username:username .*
I guess that you have changed the permissions to log in as you - cos you used something you don't need - root see https://wiki.ubuntu.com/RootSudo  to disable root
please put all your comments on one line - your current activity is spamming the channel
log out, then log into a console (as root) (Ctrl+Alt+F1 to get there) and do this, cd ~yourusername ; chown -R username:username .*
how can i give privileges of a directory and his subdirectories to an user via console?
